extendedInfo.description: The NRF LP 2013 app, created by the National Retail Federation and EventPilot, is your all-in-one guide to NRFâs Loss Prevention Conference & EXPO, June 12-14 in San Diego, CA.  As retail loss prevention and law enforcement professionals gather for 2 Â½ days of top-notch educational sessions, networking opportunities and a cutting edge EXPO Hall, this native app will provide the latest details of the program (no WiFi needed).App features:â¢ Sessions: Access session descriptions, speaker photos and bios, take notes and evaluate sessions.â¢ NOW: Stay informed about program changes, your upcoming sessions and Twitter feeds.â¢ Program: Browse the event program to build your own agenda, take notes and rate sessions.â¢ Schedule: Add important sessions or meeting invites to your personal schedule.â¢ Connect: Create your digital business card and gather contact info via QR Bump or email contacts to yourself.â¢ Take notes and email them to yourself. (WiFi needed).â¢ Maps and much more.NRF, loss prevention, risk management, asset protection, ativ,eventpilot,conference app,event app
